cake.title: Double Chocolate Brownie
cake.description: Rich chocolate brownie with generous chunks of semisweet chocolate.- VEGETARIAN

cake.title: Tiramisu Torte
cake.description: A coffee-flavoured Italian dessert. It is made of ladyfingers dipped in coffee, layered with a whipped mixture of eggs, sugar, and mascarpone cheese, flavoured with cocoa.

cake.title: Jam Filled Berliner with Cinnamon
cake.description: Classically filled with jam, the round yeast pastries, which depending on the region are also known as crepes, pancakes and donuts

coffee.title: Caffè Americano
coffee.description: Espresso shots topped with hot water create a light layer of crema culminating in this wonderfully rich cup with depth and nuance.

coffee.title: Dark Chocolate Mocha
coffee.description: Our small-lot  espresso combined with cocoa, ground chocolate and topped with steamed milk delivers a brilliant combination of sweetness.

coffee.title: Cold Brew Coffee
coffee.description: Handcrafted in small batches daily, slow-steeped in cool water for 20 hours, without touching Cold Brew is made from our custom blend of beans grown to steep long and cold for a super-smooth flavor.

smoothie.title: Java Chip Frappuccino® Blended Beverage
smoothie.description: We blend mocha sauce and Frappuccino® chips with coffee, milk and ice, then top it off with whipped cream and a mocha drizzle to bring you endless java joy.

smoothie.title: White Chocolate Mocha Frappuccino
smoothie.description: White chocolate Frappuccino® Roast coffee, milk and ice get together for what might be the best thing that happens to you all day. Oh, and there's whipped cream on top.

smoothie.title: Espresso Frappuccino® Blended Beverage
smoothie.description: Coffee is combined with a shot of espresso and milk, then blended with ice to give you a nice little jolt and lots of sipping joy.
